title: Magic Bucket
desc:
Post 841
- If <:blue:1106234079055200378>, the bucket will store water, you may use to play 2 other <:blue:1106234079055200378> cards alongside it.
- If <:green:1106234108042031166>, the bucket will store acid, you may use to play 2 other <:green:1106234108042031166> cards alongside it.
- If <:red:1106234051129507932>, the bucket will store lava, you may use to play 2 other <:red:1106234051129507932> cards alongside it.
- If <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, the bucket will store... something, you may use to play 2 other <:yellow:1106234135384699023> cards alongside it.
- If <:black:1106265022453268530>+<:white:1107514189574045726>, the bucket will store air, you may use to play 2 other <:white:1107514189574045726> or <:black:1106265022453268530> cards alongside it.
